Reviews.Title: “Fine as a stop-over hotel”
Reviews.Author: Mariafromnz
Reviews.Content: stayed wife 3 nights early march good base explore museums canal trips available within minutes walk hotel sights reached foot within half hour room clean comfortable small paid half normal rate think wouldve disappointed wed paid staff reception helpful pleasant stay hotel nothing spectacular

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay close to Bajares Airport in Madrid”
Reviews.Author: Julian S
Reviews.Content: jan luyken really close everything hire bikes get around quickly loved arrived offered upgrade 25 euros per night already paying quite room saw upgrade took instantly room huge bathroom huge balcony perfect however stayed room would disappointed really small wasnt bath back hotel lucky upgrade staff really friendly informative include charge services bill getting directions concierge standard charged also adapter cost per day didnt mention asked charges hotel great feel sorry people end mini rooms advise would ask upgrade

Reviews.Title: “Too far from city centre”
Reviews.Author: John P
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel nearly 4 years location price caused little like run elevator tvs dont work well phones boring breakfasts however service received last time rude quite frankly since regular expected better ive decided enough enough id rather stay hotel front desk staff dont treat like things room work youre staying vacation days bad youre business look elsewhere

Reviews.Title: “nice rooms, good food overall pleasantly surprised”
Reviews.Author: Pheephox
Reviews.Content: came back amsterdam spend 2 nights 22 23 hotel staff nice lets say hotel parts like lobby room look good elevator looks old rooms ok little bit small bathroom clean size ok rooms cold find turn heat use ac else behind curtains breakfast 17 per good variety food hotel 5 walk national museum van gogh museum 10 leidesplein place anyway take tram 5 2 wich 3 walk hotel brings fast anywhere city center tram 5 2 take central station 15 easy come train hope review help

Reviews.Title: “Nice Airport hotel”
Reviews.Author: jmcc752_12
Reviews.Content: husband stayed part 10 year anniversary tour europe loved hotel fantastic location close many nice restaurants close van gogh museum rijksmuseum close vondelpark location amsterdam within walking distance every tourist attraction without actually hearing night husband enjoyed walking around night dinner music around corner hear staff found anniversary put bottle wine flowers room fantastic return amsterdam returning

Reviews.Title: “Glad we stayed here!”
Reviews.Author: NYCtravelerApex_NC
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel one night late august stopover part fine family room consisted double bed beds room room good sized room modern bathroom balcony sorts air conditioning room worked well indeed terms drinking dining garden bar sat drink pleasant annoying didnt dinner hotel honest im sure restaurant open dinner carried stay breakfast included price room good actually mix hot cold items usual things cereals yoghurts pastries sausages eggs bacon cheese cold meats breads tea coffee juice etc bit strange area airport werent lot restaurants nearby eat evening find one name cannot remember 5 mins walk hotel name roughly something like happy times pleasant enough food including full menu great pool shame kids would loved swim one night offer free shuttle bus airport regular reliable service

Reviews.Title: “My favorit Airport hotel in Madrid”
Reviews.Author: Hans-Germany
Reviews.Content: order connect ave high flight baltimore spend night madrid close airport done first time hotel far satisfactory 4 hotel nice shape breakfast buffet ok airport shuttle service efficient operated hours hotels nearby complaint wifi weak room connect go lobby get internet connection except would rated hotel excellent overnight hotel airport mostly business travelers

Reviews.Title: “No wifi, no excuse, average room”
Reviews.Author: Olelie
Reviews.Content: travelled booked holiday day much time research properly free shuttle bus airport handy told call hotel first think reception may sometimes need prompt driver someone waiting took 10 minutes arrive around 5 mins take us hotel although near airport heard noise fact room quiet couldnt hear neighbours standard room believe different types even gym equipment standard rooms reasonably spacious nice bathroom full bath shower wash unit toilet bidet free safe good size tv could find one english speaking channel bbc world news great deal drawer space adequate tell hotel geared business travellers tourists told would tea coffee room wasnt asked reception promised sort nothing also asked check air conditioning couldnt adjust nothing happened reached degrees whilst madrid wanted turned positive note arrived one wardrobe doors meaning couldnt access safe reception sent man straight away fixed problem beds comfortable found pillows uncomfortable also whilst spacious balcony furniture disappointment none rooms patio furniture either found strange wed booked breakfast morning told booking agent continental well usual cold meats cheeses etc also fried boiled scrambled eggs bacon albeit spanish style sausages plus nice selection fruit cereals yogurts pastries cakes even chocolate sauce didnt eat meals hotel notice offered variety evening meals including range tapas price main issue us distance hotel centre madrid found way central madrid sol district metro although also seem lot buses nearest metro station 20 minute walk away barajas station metro system cheap plenty free maps help similar london underground colour lines barajas station ticket office tell station want give ticket metro spacious clean efficient takes 2 trains get centre madrid roughly 30 minutes travelling possibly 3 trains going farther afield never wait couple minutes connection also appeared safe saw july possible many spanish holiday summary hotel ok apart recommend youre wanting explore city get hotel nearer centre

Reviews.Title: “Unfriendly staff, rubbish Internet”
Reviews.Author: GrahamIX
Reviews.Content: put airline missing flight connection pleasantly surprised good standard airport hotel staff little possibly due checking lots people situation decent service good buffet food rooms although smallish comfortable

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and very good”
Reviews.Author: LiliNapoli
Reviews.Content: call hotel transport little difficult wait bus longer anticipated everything went smoothly reception staff helpful room excellent breakfast buffet fine excellent value money

Reviews.Title: “An unexpected stay”
Reviews.Author: move_israel
Reviews.Content: travel madrid every 15 days business reasons stay near airport tryp alameda always choice two years staff makes feel home friendly breakfast buffet good lunch menu even better great quality food style popular price rooms spacious allowed use pool summer tube 7 min walking road try terrace lunch coffee come back

Reviews.Title: “Awesome value for Money”
Reviews.Author: GauravCreations
Reviews.Content: airport hotels rarely exceptional rarely need books good airport hotel needs offer three close airport frequent airport shuttle clean rooms everything else bonus ended hotel missing flight connection assigned hotel iberia upon leaving airport building shuttle waiting passengers got us destination quick efficient manner check one front desk staff didnt speak lot quiet kind slow got job done ok experience room surprisingly large well equipped decent tv importantly free wifi internet room pleasantly surprised noise location real airport hotel bathroom good size clean rest room check second one venture outside hotel youll find bunch small bars supermarkets easy walking distance dont need feel locked airline paid dinner breakfast enjoyed meals dinner left wanting breakfast wonderful good selection sure would happy pay dinner average breakfast would decent average spain id say ready leave 7am shuttle yet waiting passengers got airport check last three key requirements well easy transport airport 510 minutes shuttle bus reasonably large clean comfortable rooms without noise good nights sleep decent breakfast even though didnt pay hotel would happy pay

Reviews.Title: “Didn´t have another choice, OK for overnight”

Reviews.Content: room ok although little worn annoyed big time though room wifi none rooms least thats told called complain seem wifi reception area excuse offered mentioned promised booking hotel room wifi excuse false several airport hotels barajas never

Reviews.Title: “Decent stay in between the flights.”
Reviews.Author: Helen34438
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel working madrid arrived took check wasnt due booking issue 45 minutes receptionist overall spent little time hotel clean comfy well good shower would expect airport hotel although airport hotel take get airport need allow extra time journey

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant surprise for an airport hotel”
Reviews.Author: citizenMcDermott
Reviews.Content: despite small entrance hotel great check fast room large quiet good beds bathroom dinner almost tasty

Reviews.Title: “Overnight only”

Reviews.Content: ok lets make one thing clear hotel pick madrid vacation located barajas minutes airport free shuttle runs every 10 minutes decent number restaurants supermarkets within walking distance hotel rooms clean pretty good shape wifi included room price approx € 65 stay need close airport wish visit barajas think better options

Reviews.Content: everyday busy customers missed connection therefore customer service quality basic always customers anyway make effort bad ok rooms ok ammenities ok airport shuttle ok restaurant waiters unfriendly even spanish standards meals basic drinks included tap water didnt choice stay 4 star hotel like 23 star

Reviews.Title: “Great food”
Reviews.Author: badiisa
Reviews.Content: stay missed connection flight located 1015 minutes free shuttle airport front desk pleasant spoke perfect english room good size bit dated king bed comfortable sleep pillows sausage style soft bathroom everything would need tho breakfast lunch delicious kind weird story internet paid 24 hours could use laptop ipad plug cable good relaxing stay next flight

Reviews.Title: “Great Madrid conference venue”
Reviews.Author: bobchamb
Reviews.Content: iberia flight delayed next morning iberia provided us overnight stay hotel thought airport hotel airline probably bed shower place allows travelling two first hotel upgraded us asking premium room room spacious lovely bathroom tubshower included toiletries kingsize bed comfortable body pillows bed sheets large balcony two chairs sitting enjoying city view madrid pretty far distance though tired decided order room service rather venture one restaurants room service menu quite extensive food arrived 30 minutes later delicious breakfast buffet next morning bit better expected well typical european style breakfast good selection fruits spanish items de hadnt iberia never would stayed hotel ever overnight barajas definitely one places wed choose

Reviews.Title: “Good quality airport hotel with top staff and good food”
Reviews.Author: Brixtonesque
Reviews.Content: 3 times due overnight shuttle bus wait 30 min airport calling somewhat normal spain staff checkin ok bar staff lacking short staff guess helpful breakfast terrible nothing somewhat normal spain also low mid budget hotel room ok clean air conditioning sufficient summer bed bathroom average internet ok cable code lobby otherwise bad choice overnight

Reviews.Title: “A GREAT Airport Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Michael J
Reviews.Content: thanks friends iberia airlines also known worst airline spend night hotel provide shuttle service runs every 20 minutes takes hotel around 15 minutes really convenient free really liked girls reception desk super friendly seem quite used angry got plans ruined room spacious new really good conditions beds really comfortable huge tv channels main languages toilet clean well equipped even provide toiletries may get hotels anymore dinner ok enough get salad cold stuff like sausages cheese buffet quite poor hand really liked breakfast different types bread fresh juices ham among sausages lots fruit looking really spanish breakfast pastries looked quite good didnt warm things dont usually eat early would repeat need go barajas early morning hope iberia

Reviews.Title: “Excellent airport hotel, close to airport but with access to city.”
Reviews.Author: janewdc
Reviews.Content: iberia managed return flight madrid put hotel flight next morning passengers unable catch flight due airline exactly would expect functional would like stay one night restaurant self service food chicken fish cold chips room comfortable like every airport hotel wont choice hotel iberia use passengers choice go madrid proper experience city

Reviews.Title: “At least the airline paid for us”
Reviews.Author: travelevers
Reviews.Content: nicest hotel stayed time europe definitely top line place room extremely comfortable huge large closet bathroom balcony overlooking parking lot balconies huge flat screen tv large desk nice chair coffee table bathroom luxurious loved stay breakfast typical breakfast cereal hot meals oh gym well gym

Reviews.Title: “Consistent and close to the airport”
Reviews.Author: fran07Belgium
Reviews.Content: hotel day flight got cancelled 10 mins drive hotel thought free shuttle airport provided wait half hour night arrived almost hour next day rooms chic bed comfortable everything including meals paid airline dinner well breakfast next day buffet put names dishes found confusing wine included menu well didnt know metro available 10 mins walk away caught airport taking shuttle bus early morning overall enjoyed free stay city madrid

Reviews.Title: “Good location if need to spend one night by the airport”
Reviews.Author: rosannar
Reviews.Content: organised conference airport hotel chosen handy location barajas free shuttle bus ride terminals run 247 impressed end staff could helpful spoke good english didnt still efficient conference rooms spacious light bedrooms comfortable spacious enough food delicious standard airport hotel buffet dinners breakfasts 3 days sound proofing bedrooms good didnt hear plane noise slight issues internet connection free meeting rooms otherwise fairly costly lack outside space small terrace big enough conference meals area isnt anything interesting little square 10 minutes walk away nice cafes taxi central madrid takes half hour costs 25 euros barajas metro stop 10 minutes walk away

Reviews.Title: “OK airport transfer hotel”
Reviews.Author: morgyn
Reviews.Content: usually hate airport hotels surly staff theyll never see bad food bad service stayed hotel madrids barajas airport last week great terrific food smiling staff drawback bus ride terminals thats ok conference could enough us

Reviews.Title: “Good if you need to be near airport”
Reviews.Author: kyrat
Reviews.Content: chose airport hotel one area offer 24 hrs free shuttle airport early flight shuttle comes goes every 15 min hotel excellent beautiful spacious rooms bar restaurant offers variety rooms depending needs fitness rooms kids rooms offers lots toiletries gorgeous bathrooms shaving set toothbrush etc also hair dryer course sized tub room minibar safe theres cable internet available extra cost lobby theres also wi fi extra cost problem time arrived one lady reception taking care checking customers attending phones poor lady going crazy still managed nice despite face grumpy customers wait long time turn checking hope hotel takes note someone else work reception well location excellent 400 meters barajas metro station easily get madrid since hotel within airport surrounding area restaurants shops youre arriving shuttle service print google map hotel otherwise little hard find since exactly avenida little hidden overall excellent hotel really nice like location

Reviews.Title: “This hotel sucks with a capital S.”
Reviews.Author: acb98sm
Reviews.Content: stay took place snow december 2010 part compensation package airline airport shuttle barajas hotel ask reception advance need go hotel airport due snow long line get keys room however staff kept cool always helpful room good clean quiet wash room might size sleeping area internet free better stay lobby wireless dining room back hotel next patio due compensation scheme fixed meals given satisfying overall good hotel quite convenient need stay overnight

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel”

Reviews.Content: regularly stay tryp alameda family flights south america also good choice visit madrid metro station 400 away ride madrids center takes 20 minutes service last years staff nice rooms modern clean food cafeteria ok breakfast buffet excellent recommend hotel also free shuttle service airport terminals use pool close hotel barajas melia

Reviews.Title: “Thank you Iberia for free night and 3 meals”
Reviews.Author: Steveh3Texas
Reviews.Content: stay one night flight changed assistance iberia great luggage waiting us went us hotel hotel walking distance metro station dont mind walking like 15 minutes coming back late night best take cab since spots metro hotel dark plus charge 5 euros worth coming back tired late worth paying day ticket use train buses unlimited sour note driver shuttle bus rude made comment moving since carry medium luggage carry next day asked moved closer inform hotel dont know something hope reported company change say besides job people like us traveling country needless say didnt even gave tip

Reviews.Title: “Close but not the best”

Reviews.Content: hotel ok overnight airport transfers clean enough high quality toiletries room staff really friendly airport hotels staff dont care much maybe think youll never see case right wont back hotel free bus service give time get airport free internet poor bar bars near id advice travelers stay room strange places strange customers also irish bar near joke need shower bed ok little expensive place airport hotel ok

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel but a bit far from the metro”

Reviews.Content: layover madrid flying early next morning found hotel think nearby start bad 1 didnt seem record reservation 20 hours exhausted good 10 minutes checked found entirely fair may well fault hotels still stay 2 probably fair every single bed spain bad bed rock hard made happy much 3 metro bit away someone exhausted travelling day plus rain plus getting bit lost ended taking taxi back good 7 min free shuttle airport smoke free room last used shared shaft w smokers entire floor smoke free someone used spain smoke filled space pleasing bathroom long tub room quite nice good curtains keep light quiet though hear guests hallway making effort keep

Reviews.Title: “a comfortable but pricy place to wait for a plane”
Reviews.Author: the_bruja_is_back
Reviews.Content: thought hotel fabulous overnight flight layover 15 minute airport frequently running free shuttle came airport already waiting passengers hotel room lovely especially vacation budget hotels bathroom amenities could need peaceful room comfortable bed best part however hotel short walking distance restaurants including great bar neighborhood doesnt feel central madrid actually quite nice

Reviews.Title: “Great hotle”
Reviews.Author: sisIreland
Reviews.Content: stayed one night arrived midnight bit problem hotel couldnt get took ages public airport airport staff helpful taxis taxi rank refused take us hotel shuttle bus arrived everything fine room great 2 boys bathroom something would expect 5 star hotel staff helpful

Reviews.Title: “Unfriendly staff”
Reviews.Author: Henri32
Reviews.Content: id rate three stars close barajas far avenida center downtown madrid pretty much center nightlife youre madrid proper youre far prado palace plaza major amazing painted walls

Reviews.Title: “Tryp Alameda Aeropuerto Great”
Reviews.Author: romeo16
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights due flight cancellation hotel good disappointed terrible pillows unfriendly staff certain internet sites nothing either one evening bar cost us 2 night stay warned found great little bar round corner breakfast evening meal reasonable cost plus side comfortable clean close metro station shuttle service airport early hours bad

Reviews.Title: “4 star? No way!”
Reviews.Author: Brazil 26 Couple
Reviews.Content: put hotel iberia flight delayed 4 star hotel bottom end room clean able request connecting rooms children buffet dinner breakfast fine provide face room problem us luggage stuck airport bed excellent overall ok could lot worse however could stay lot nicer hotels around airport hilton

Reviews.Title: “WORST hotel ever”
Reviews.Author: ossy19
Reviews.Content: hotel chosen early flight back home convenient shuttle every 20 minutes airport also metro 10 minute walk away go town 15 minutes dinner madrid found place clean brand new room large problem heating wasnt controlled warm us staff front desk helpful available sometimes one person reception needed wait quite lot attention tryp alameda better youd expect airport hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel with bad front staff”
